This app collects location data for clinical use and research studies even when the app is closed or not in use. Your data is HIPAA-compliant and de-identified. It is stored in a secured, encrypted format accessible only to your clinician and/or research study coordinators.

mindLAMP requires unrestricted battery access for collecting data effectively. Please disable battery optimization for the app to function properly.
Enable your device\'s location to collect the Wi-Fi data effectively.
Health Connect is supported on this device, but is either not installed, or requires an update.

This app integrates with Google Health Connect to securely access health and fitness data already stored on your device. These permissions are required for core features used in approved clinical research programs at Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center’s Division of Digital Psychiatry.

Why each data type is requested

1.Steps, Distance, Activity — used to understand daily mobility patterns for research.
 2.Speed — used to analyze transportation and mobility trends.
 3.Heart Rate — used to study stress physiology and mental-health–related heart rate changes.
 4.Respiratory Rate — used to assess exercise levels and cardiorespiratory fitness.
 5.Sleep — used to understand the impact of sleep duration and patterns on wellbeing.
 6.Active & Total Calories, Basal Metabolic Rate — used to study physical activity and energy use.
 7.Body Temperature — used to evaluate physiological trends related to stress.
 8.Body Fat — used for body-composition insights relevant to wellness research.
 9.Hydration — used to understand hydration patterns that may affect mood and cognition.
 10.Nutrition — used to assess dietary patterns related to mental health outcomes.
 11.Blood Pressure — used only in specific clinical studies involving cardiovascular factors.
 12.Blood Glucose — used only in approved programs studying metabolic factors.
 13.Oxygen Saturation — used in research involving breathing, sleep, and physiological patterns.
 How your data is handled

1.Data is used only within authorized clinical research studies.
 2.Data is not collected, shared, or transmitted without your explicit informed consent.
 3.You may revoke Health Connect permissions at any time in your device settings.
 4.Removing permissions does not affect your ability to participate in other non-data features of the study.
